channel.title: Cant drop items?
channel.description:
hi i recently did an eco reset on my server and the source i am using is pi
what i need to know is how to enable dropping for players
because at the moment wwhen you drop an item it just disappears lol could someone please explain to me where and maybe how to fix this?
